trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for types that define a list of items used to create a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder basisklassen for som definerer en liste med elementer som brukes til å opprette et smartkort koden panel.

trans-unit.source: The `DesignerAction` feature enables components and controls to display context-sensitive information and commands.
trans-unit.target: Den `DesignerAction` -funksjonen aktiverer komponenter og kontroller for å vise kontekstavhengig informasjon og kommandoer.

trans-unit.source: The `DesignerAction` feature can be thought of as a replacement for designer verbs, because a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> can be displayed in the smart tag panel and also in the shortcut menu associated with a component or control.
trans-unit.target: Den `DesignerAction` funksjonen kan sammenlignes med en erstatning for designer verb, fordi en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>kan vises i panelet smart koden og hurtigmenyen knyttet til en komponent eller kontroll.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionList class represents the main point of interaction for developers who want to add smart tag support to their custom components and controls.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerActionList representerer primære punktet samhandling for utviklere som ønsker å legge til støtte for smart kode til egendefinerte komponenter og -kontroller.

trans-unit.source: DesignerActionList is the base class, derived from by component developers in order to populate a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: DesignerActionList er basisklassen avledet fra av komponentutviklere for å fylle ut et smartkort koden panel.

trans-unit.source: A smart tag panel represents the menu-like user interface (UI) for smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Et smartkort koden panel representerer i menyen like brukergrensesnittet (UI) for smart koder.

trans-unit.source: This derived class may implement the `virtual`<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method to return a collection of objects derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>.
trans-unit.target: Denne utledede klassen kan implementere den `virtual` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>metode for å returnere en samling av objekter som er avledet fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: These objects represent the smart tag panel items.
trans-unit.target: Disse objektene representerer smart koden panelet elementer.

trans-unit.source: Each item is displayed in the panel according to its type.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element vises i panelet i henhold til filtypen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem> is displayed as a static text label.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem>vises som en statisk etikett.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem>

trans-unit.source: Active panel items, represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> types, have a corresponding publicly accessible property or method, respectively, that implements the functionality for that item.
trans-unit.target: Aktive elementer, som representerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>typer, har en tilsvarende den allment tilgjengelige egenskap eller metode, henholdsvis som implementerer funksjonaliteten for dette elementet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to add items to the smart tag panel, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du legge til elementer i panelet smart kode, kan du se den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Forms and dialog boxes can be displayed by members of the class derived from DesignerActionList.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Skjemaer og dialogbokser kan vises av medlemmer av klasse som er utledet fra DesignerActionList.

trans-unit.source: By default, the parent of these windows will be the container window for the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Som standard blir overordnede disse windows vinduet beholder for smart koden panelet.

trans-unit.source: Explicitly parenting these child windows to another service or window may cause smart tags to display improperly.
trans-unit.target: Eksplisitt av overordnet disse underordnede windows til en annen tjeneste eller vinduet, kan det føre til at smart merker skal vises riktig.

trans-unit.source: > > Smart-tag panels do not support scrolling or paging, so be careful not to populate your panels with many smart-tag items.
trans-unit.target: >> Smartkortet ID-merking paneler ikke støtter rulling eller bla, så pass på at ikke for å fylle ut din paneler med mange elementer du smart-koden.

trans-unit.source: Too many items may result in the smart-tag panel extending beyond the screen boundary.
trans-unit.target: For mange elementer kan føre til smartkortet koden panelet går ut over grenselinjen skjermen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>konstruktøren angir den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: A component related to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En komponent som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the smart tag panel should automatically be displayed when it is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om panelet smart koden automatisk skal vises når det er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: If the property value is set to `true`, the component with which this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is associated will automatically expand and display the smart tag panel when the component is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapsverdien er satt til `true`, komponenten med som denne <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>er tilknyttet vil automatisk utvide, slik at smart koden panelet når komponenten er opprettet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: You can opt out of this behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions.ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge utenfor dette problemet ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions.ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions.ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the panel should be shown when the owning component is created; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis panelet skal vises når eier komponenten er opprettet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component related to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter komponent som er relatert til <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A component related to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En komponent som er relatert til <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that represents a service provided by the component associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som representerer en tjeneste fra komponent som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tjeneste fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer en tjeneste fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> does not provide the specified service.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> leverer ikke tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"></xref> objects contained in the list.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer samlingen av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"> </xref> objekter i listen.

trans-unit.source: The `virtual`GetSortedActionItems method is implemented to return, in the expected display order, a collection of objects derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Den `virtual`GetSortedActionItems metoden implementeres for å returnere en samling objekter som er avledet fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>klassen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> i den forventede visningsrekkefølgen

trans-unit.source: These items can be of the following specific types.
trans-unit.target: Disse elementene kan være følgende typer bestemte.

trans-unit.source: |Type|Description| |----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem>|The group label, displayed in bold.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem>|A label, displayed in a plain font.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>|A panel item associated with a property.
trans-unit.target: | Typen | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem>| Gruppeetikett, vises i fet. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem>| En etikett vises i en vanlig skrift. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>| En knyttet til en egenskap i kontrollpanelet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionTextItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionHeaderItem>

trans-unit.source: May also display a check mark or property editor associated with the underlying property.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>|A panel item displayed as a hyperlink and associated with a method.| For every <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>, a corresponding method or property must be added to the programmer-supplied class derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class.
trans-unit.target: Det kan også vises en hake eller Egenskapsredigering som er knyttet til den underliggende egenskapen. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>| En panelet elementet vises som en hyperkobling, og som er tilknyttet en annen metode. | For hver <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>en tilsvarende metoden eller egenskapen må legges til klassen levert av programmer som er avledet fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>klassen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: Each method and property item is displayed as an active entry; interacting with it through the user interface (UI) invokes the corresponding method or property, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Hvert metoden og egenskapen element vises som en aktiv oppføring; samhandling med den via brukergrensesnittet aktiverer (UI) tilsvarende metoden eller egenskapen henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: Property items have a special panel-item interface that enables display and manipulation of their corresponding property values.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen elementer har et bestemt kontrollpanelet grensesnitt som kan vise og manipulering av de tilsvarende egenskapsverdiene.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>

trans-unit.source: The order of the items in the returned array reflects the order that they will appear in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen av elementer i den returnerte matrisen gjenspeiler rekkefølgen som de skal vises i panelet.

trans-unit.source: The items are grouped according to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> property, using the following rules: - The category of the first item encountered signifies the start of the first group.
trans-unit.target: Elementene er gruppert i henhold til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A>egenskap, ved hjelp av følgende regler:-kategorien for det første elementet oppstått angir starten på den første gruppen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A>

trans-unit.source: That group continues as long as each succeeding item is of the same category.
trans-unit.target: Denne gruppen fortsetter så lenge hvert etterfølgende elementet er av samme kategori.

trans-unit.source: When an item of a different, new category is encountered, a new group is created and the item is placed in it.
trans-unit.target: Når et element av en annen, nye kategori oppstår, opprettes en ny gruppe og elementet er plassert i den.

trans-unit.source: - If an item has a type different than the current group, but that category has already been used, the item is placed in the matching existing category.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis et element har en annen type enn gjeldende gruppe, men denne kategorien er allerede brukt, plasseres elementet i den tilsvarende eksisterende kategorien.

trans-unit.source: - If an item does not have a category, it is placed in a miscellaneous group at the end of the panel.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis et element ikke har en kategori, er plassert i en diverse på slutten av panelet.

trans-unit.source: This group also contains items whose <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne gruppen inneholder også elementer som <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetSortedActionItems method is called when the panel is first created.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetSortedActionItems kalles når panelet opprettes.

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method to update the list of items displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Du må kalle den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A>metode for å oppdatere listen over elementer som vises i panelet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"></xref> array that contains the items in this list.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"> </xref> matrise som inneholder elementene i listen.
